Package model

Class CSV

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.CSV
  • public class CSV
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the OpenCSV CSVReader
    Version:
    05/09/2018
    Author:
    Angus Mackenzie
    See Also:
    CSVReader

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CSV​(char delimiter, java.lang.String filename)
      Creates the a CSV reader, but uses the specified delimiter
      CSV​(java.lang.String filename)
      Takes in filename, checks if it is correct, otherwise creates a reader
      CSV​(java.lang.String outputFile, java.util.List<java.lang.String> heading)
      Takes in a file path, and writes the firstLine of the CSV
